data.name: Muse-5 godness
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains 5 muses. After purchase, you can open the level 2 Battle of the muse realm.

How to obtain Muses:
1. Win and collect the red soul in the second level Muse battle ;
2. Light up a muse for every 2 red spirits consumed in the chart.
3. You can interact with the goddess in dating and photo albums.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512M
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
